plot: Host Regan Burns chats with filmmakers, experts, and fans about a particular movie and why they think it's classic. Later he tests their knowledge in a trivia game.
plot_en: Host Regan Burns chats with filmmakers, experts, and fans about a particular movie and why they think it's classic. Later he tests their knowledge in a trivia game.
plot_es: Host Regan Burns chats with filmmakers, experts, and fans about a particular movie and why they think it's classic. Later he tests their knowledge in a trivia game.
title: Cinemania
